body_html: Are you using tcmalloc? If not you should try that first. tcmalloc is a much more efficient malloc than default which prevents memory fragmentation which can easily look like a memory leak.
body_text: Are you using tcmalloc? If not you should try that first. tcmalloc is a much more efficient malloc than default which prevents memory fragmentation which can easily look like a memory leak.
body: Are you using tcmalloc? If not you should try that first. tcmalloc is a much more efficient malloc than default which prevents memory fragmentation which can easily look like a memory leak.
